uberto.text: 🚶‍♂️ You just parked your ride outside a brand new bar that just opened up. As you walk toward the entrance, you notice a homeless man holding a sign that reads "Need help 🙏."

talkhomeless.text: 🧔‍♂️ The man looks up and says, "You seem like someone who notices things. That bar’s more than it seems. Watch the lime 🍈 if you go inside."

homelesshint.text: 🧔‍♂️ "The lime isn’t just a fruit here. It’s a guide. Follow it if you want to see beyond the usual." 🍈✨

homelessstory.text: 🧔‍♂️ "I’ve been around this block a few times. The bar changed me once, gave me visions I still can’t explain. Take care inside."

donate.text: 🧔‍♂️ "Hey, thanks man! If you're heading into the bar, order a key lime shot! 🍈 It's the best part of going there."

choices.walkin: 👍 Thank him and walk into the bar

walkin.text: 🍻 You step into the bar and approach the bartender, who turns toward you and says, "What'll it be?"

martini.text: 🍸 "Sounds like someone’s getting fancy! They've got the best martinis here," says the person sitting next to you.

choices.martinidrinker: 😄 "I've drunk my fair share of martinis in my day."

martinidrinker.text: 🍸 "Ah, a fellow connoisseur!" they say, swirling their own drink. "You know, they say the martinis here have... special properties. Ever notice how the olives seem to glow?"

choices.keylime: 🍈 "Actually, I was thinking of trying a key lime shot..."
choices.investigate: 🔍 "What do you mean by special properties?"

water.text: 💦 The bartender hands you a glass of water and says, "This one's on me. Stay hydrated! 💧"

soda.text: 🥤 "Sounds like someone’s getting bubbly! They've got the best sodas here," says the person sitting next to you.

choices.sodadrinker: 😄 "I've drunk my fair share of sodas in my day."

sodadrinker.text: 🥂 "Then you're in the right place, friend. Cheers to carbonated life! 🥤✨"

horses.text: 😨 "I'm not sure why you asked that... but I have a terrible fear of horses! 🐎"
horses.lose: 🚫 You're kindly asked to leave the bar.

liquor.text: 🥃 "Sounds like someone’s looking to have a wild night!" the bartender jokes as she hands you the drink.

choices.adventure: 🧭 "I like a little adventure now and then."

wildnightstory.text: 🍸 "This bar? It’s not just drinks — it’s a place where time and reality get a little... stretched."

mississippi.text: 🐊 The bartender raises an eyebrow. "Not since the alligator incident of '09... 🐊😳"

laugh.text: 😅 You laugh it off, feeling a bit more at ease.

adventure.text: 🌌 "Well, you're in for a treat. Strange things happen here after midnight..." she says with a wink. 🌙✨

keylime.text: ✨ Shortly after taking the shot, you see a glowing lime 🍈 floating in the air, waving you toward a hallway.

choices.hallwaylime: 🚶‍♂️ Follow the lime into the hallway

hallwaylime.text: 🌈 You follow the glowing lime 🍈 down a dimly lit hallway. The walls shimmer with green neon light as jazz music grows louder. At the end of the corridor, a velvet curtain parts for you — seemingly on its own.

secretlounge.text: 🎷 You enter a hidden lounge filled with candlelight, velvet booths, and a live jazz trio playing smooth tunes. An elegant woman in a vintage gown approaches you with a sly smile.

choices.askquestions: ❓ Ask her what's going on here

talktolady.placeholder: Say something to the mysterious woman...

mysterydrink.text: 🍷 You take a sip of the drink. It's rich, tangy, and strangely energizing. Suddenly, the room around you slows down — like time itself is stretching.

choices.panic: 😰 Panic and look for an exit

askquestions.text: 🕵️‍♂️ "This is the Lime Room," she says. "A place for those who notice the signs. Most people walk past the lime. But not you."

choices.acceptmission: 🗺️ Ask if there’s more to discover

slowtime.text: 🌀 You lean into the sensation, and suddenly everything sharpens — you hear whispers of conversations past and future. You’ve unlocked *The Sight*.

choices.walkin: 🔁 Return to the main bar, changed

panic.text: 🚨 You bolt back through the curtain. The hallway twists and turns in ways it didn't before, but eventually, you find yourself back at the bar — shaken, but safe.

acceptmission.text: 📜 She leans in and whispers a name and a phrase: *Uberto. The path is in the fizz.* Then vanishes into the crowd.

choices.walkin: 🔁 Return to the bar, pondering her words

decline.text: 😐 You thank her and return through the curtain. The hallway is quiet now. The lime is gone.

ladyname.text: 👒 She smiles faintly. "You can call me Livia. Names are like flavors here — always changing."

loungeinfo.text: 🛋️ "This is the Lime Room. A place between places — for those who look beyond the ordinary."

drinklore.text: 🍹 "That drink is older than this building. Made with key limes grown under a green moon. Most people can't even see it."

milkorder.text: 🥛 The bartender stares at you. "Milk? You sure you're in the right place, partner?"

sodaflavor.text: 🧃 "I’m a sucker for orange cream. Reminds me of childhood summers! What about you?"

sodaphilosophy.text: 🧠 "Soda is like life — sweet, fizzy, and sometimes a little unpredictable."

unknownresponse.text: 🤔 The man looks confused by your question and shakes his head.

unknown.text: 🤷‍♂️ The bartender blinks, clearly unsure what you meant.
